about_the_game:
Daymare: 1998 Digital Soundtrack that contains two hours of music divided into songs that will let you dive into the nostalgic and dark atmosphere of the '90s.

List of songs:

1) Daymare: 1998 Main Theme - 3:23
2) A Storm of Frequencies - 3:57
3) Landed - 0:32
4) A buried Screamer - 5:05
5) The Modern Prometheus - 1:36
6) The silicon Shelter - 1:45
7) Purification Process - 2:24
8) Inescapable - 0:35
9) Change of Plane - 3:15
10) Far From Everything - 3:09
11) Double-Crosser - 1:41
12) The Outbreak (Ambient) - 3:24
13) Isolated - 0:33
14) A Brief Relief - 1:36
15) Into a Dusky Mind - 0:48
16) On the Edge of the Mountains - 2:36
17) Time to Back Home - 0:51
18) Mere Shadows - 1:06
19) Endless Pain - 1:24
20) She’s Gone - 0:55
21) No More Dreams - 0:33
22) Reality - 2:10
23) Running Away From Home - 2:12
24) Consumed by Vengeance - 0:34
25) Rendez Vous - 2:32
26) The Aseptic Labyrinth - 7:12
27) Falling Stars - 1:31
28) No Mercy - 0:20
29) Forgotten Soldier - 1:03
30) Beyond the Mirror - 6:34
31) The Roots of all Evil - 7:53
32) Crawling Above You - 2:50
33) Not Enough Far From Hell - 0:24
34) Iron and Fire - 3:08
35) Where’d He Go - 0:38
36) Cornered - 6:31
37) Crime and Punishment - 6:12
38) A new Hope - 1:16
39) The Town of Lies - 6:58
40) Hunted - 0:10
41) Caged - 3:21
42) The Lair of the Devil - 6:40
43) Behind Your Back - 0:56
44) The Last Experiment - 3:24
45) Unstoppable Torment - 3:30
46) The Clock Is Ticking - 0:44
47) Face to Face - 2:20
48) Zero Sum - 5:31
49) Comrades - 3:47
50) Underbelly - 3:47
51) Secret Message - 2:15
52) Too Late - 0:30
53) Safe Place - 1:06
54) The Ravenus - 0:18
55) End of the Path - 1:44
56) Something “Wrong” - 2:00
57) Something “Wrong” (Alter. Version) - 1:47
58) Gloomy Night - 1:09

The DLC contains both mp3 and wave files.
